name: up897514_asteroidrose
description:
You are the heart.

Keyboard:

*space - move (keep pressed)
*mouse left button - hit
*mouse right button - hit with bomb 
*"R" key - restart the game

You will start the game with 5hp and 0 bombs.
You can gain more hp and bombs by collecting the "heart" and "B" (see in the picture);
For more points, you need to collect the pink circle (see in the picture).

Shoot as many roses as you can!

Reference:

*BFXR sounds

*Shaun Spalding
